Class Speedboat

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ship
      • Speedboat

  • public class Speedboat
extends Ship
    A fast Ship. Red and going 20 knots by default. Created to illustrate inheritance and the need for "super".

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Speedboat(double x, double y, double speed, double direction, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String color)
      Builds a speedboat with specified parameters.
      Speedboat(java.lang.String name)
      Builds a red Speedboat going N at 20 knots.

    • Method Summary

      void printLocation()
      Reports location.

      Sets the Speedboat's color.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
